DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to gather epidemiological data in a population of GERD patients in primary care with a history of erosive esophagitis (less than or equal to 3 years).
DOC.brief_title: Impact of GERD on Daily Life (NIS)
DOC.criteria: Patients with erosive esophagitis (endoscopical findings according to the Los Angeles Classification; grade AD) currently not treated with a proton pump inhibitor, for whom the general practitioner (GP) has decided to initiate or change the treatment for GERD
